question: How many Rijksmonumenten (national heritage sites) are there in Leeuwarden, Netherlands?
asked_question_translated: Combien y a-t-il de Rijksmonumenten (sites du patrimoine national) à Leeuwarden, Pays-Bas ?
answer: À Leeuwarden, aux Pays-Bas, il y a environ 620 Rijksmonumenten.
answer_translated_eng: In Leeuwarden, in the Netherlands, there are around 620 Rijksmonumenten.
